home.description: Manage your activities, participants, and registrations with ease.
home.activitiesDescription: Create an activity by clicking on {addIcon}. You can create multiple activities using the same activity type on different dates. Easy! An example of such an activity is RevAqua on 11/11/25.
home.activityTypesDescription: First define an activity type. This can be an existing type or a new type of activity you just thought up. Congratulations.
home.participantsDescription: Manage participant information and details and add them to an activity type. Note: if you don't do this, the participant won't appear in the list for your activity! Add them, remove them, do what you want. Well, not entirely. Be a little careful.
home.registrationsDescription: Then, go to the activity and manage the registrations for your activity by clicking on {registrationsIcon}. Just search for the participant and mark him or her as present. Oops, can't find the participant? Then add them. But watch out for duplicates. If necessary, first search for the participant in the participants screen (there you see them all) and check if the participant is assigned to your activity.
